summary: Comprehensive frontend testing completed for Ã–H Wirtschaft website redesign v5. All requested features verified including the corrected program name 'MSc. Leadership and Innovation in Organizations' on both Home and Studium pages.
passed_tests: Navigation works on all pages (Home, Team, Studium, Services, Magazine)
Program name 'MSc. Leadership and Innovation in Organizations' correctly displayed on Home page (Master list)
Program name 'MSc. Leadership and Innovation in Organizations' correctly displayed on Studium page (Master list and Updates section)
Old incorrect name 'MSc. Leading Innovative Organizations' is NOT present anywhere
FAQ accordions on Services page open/close correctly (14 FAQ items)
Studiengang-Updates accordions on Studium page work correctly (12 program updates)
All external links verified: Sprechstunde (zeeg.me), Calendar imports (Apple, Google, Outlook, Yahoo, Office365), Brochures (heyzine.com), Magazine editions, Submit form (Google Forms)
Mobile responsiveness working - hamburger menu, navigation, content layout
Scroll animations and reveal effects working throughout all pages
Team page shows Vorsitzender (Maximilian Pilsner) and 13 team members
Magazine/Ceteris Paribus page accessible with German/English editions and submission timeline
Quick link cards on Home page navigate correctly
Footer with all navigation links, email, Instagram, LinkedIn, oeh.jku.at
All data-testid attributes present and functional
Uni colors (Blue #0294cb, Gold #f3aa1f) used throughout design
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. The main content correction (MSc. Leadership and Innovation in Organizations) has been verified on both Home.js and Studium.js. All navigation, accordions, external links, and mobile responsiveness are functioning properly.

verified_content_corrections.program_name_corrected: MSc. Leadership and Innovation in Organizations
